Hi to everyone who reads this,

I am new to Samurai culture. I have been interested in it for a long 
time, especially in the code of the Samurai, the Bushido, as it 
seems to me to be an excellent way to live ones life. I am now 
trying to learn about the history of the Samurai order, however i 
know very little. Is it possible someone could recomend some 
starting literature or websites that would be beneficial to me? My e-
mail address is wolfscryanddragonsbreath@... If you do have 
any help, it would be greatly appreciated.

Thanking you all in advance! :-)

Ian
